physical_examinations.relevant_findings: General: well appearing, NAD; HEENT: normocephalic, atraumatic, no scleral icterus; Resp: breathing comfortably on room air; CV: regular rate and rhythm on monitor; Abdomen: soft, appropriately tender, but improved from admission, drain in place draining cloudy, purulent appearing fluid; Extremities: Warm and well perfused
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Abdomen was appropriately tender but improved from admission.
